mapper.select: SELECT a.function_id as functionId FROM authorities a JOIN role_users r ON a.tenant_id=r.tenant_id AND a.role_id=r.role_id WHERE r.user_id=#{id} AND a.allow_deny=1 AND r.avaliable_date < #{lastLoginAt} AND r.unavaliable_date > #{lastLoginAt} AND a.api_yn=1
SELECT a.function_id as functionId FROM authorities a WHERE a.tenant_id=#{tenantId} AND a.allow_deny=1 AND a.api_yn=1

SELECT tenant_id as tenantId, customer_id as customerId FROM customers_individual WHERE (name_kana_sei LIKE CONCAT('%',#{nameKanaSei},'%') OR name_kana_mei LIKE CONCAT('%',#{nameKanaMei},'%')) AND tenant_id=#{tenantId} ORDER BY updated_at DESC
SELECT * FROM tenants WHERE api_key=#{apiKey} LIMIT 1
